title: Conjure Elemental
content:
Wizard, Warlock (Invocation), Bard (Magical Secrets at level 10) Conjure Elemental can be cast by using the following Items: Scroll of Conjure Elemental

Druid, Circle of the Coast, Wizard, Warlock (Invocation), Bard (Magical Secrets at level 10)

Scroll of Conjure Elemental

Conjure Elemental Tips & Notes

Notes & Tips go here

Lvl 5 Spells Banishing Smite ♦ Cloudkill ♦ Cone of Cold ♦ Contagion ♦ Curriculum of Strategy: Artistry of War ♦ Danse Macabre ♦ Destructive Wave ♦ Dethrone ♦ Dispel Evil
